entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 p.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
